H0.text: In Greek mythology what was the name of the goatlike man with pointed ears, horns and a tail. Faun

H1.text: In Greek mythology what was the name of the goatlike man with pointed ears, horns and a tail. Pan

H2.text: In Greek mythology what was the name of the goatlike man with pointed ears, horns and a tail. Silenus

H3.text: In Greek mythology what was the name of the goatlike man with pointed ears, horns and a tail. Satyr

A4.text: The satyr Silenus was the tutor of the young Dionysus.

A5.text: Satyrs were characterized by their ribaldry and were known as lovers of wine, music, dancing, and women.

A7.text: The Warburg Institute Iconographic Database (images of Satyrs)
